channel.title: PI Compile error Ubuntu
channel.description:
[code=java]
brandon@brandon-ET1331G:~/Desktop/SageScape2$ bash Compiler.sh javac: invalid flag: src/server/world/map/*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options [/code] SH file: [code=java]#!/bin/sh deps="$deps deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:deps/jython.jar:deps/xstream.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/poi.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar" dirs="$dirs src/server/event/*.java src/server/model/items/*.java src/server/model/minigames/*.java src/server/model/npcs/*.java src/server/model/objects/*.java src/server/model/players/*.java src/server/model/players/skills/*.java src/server/model/players/packets/*.java src/server/model/shops/*.java src/server/net/*.java src/server/task/*.java src/server/util/*.java src/server/world/*.java src/server/util/log/*.java src/server/*.java src/server/world/map/*.java" javac -classpath $deps -d bin $dirs[/code] Same error when like: [code=java]#!/bin/sh javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:deps/jython.jar:deps/xstream.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/poi.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src/server/event/*.java src/server/model/items/*.java src/server/model/minigames/*.java src/server/model/npcs/*.java src/server/model/objects/*.java src/server/model/players/*.java src/server/model/players/skills/*.java src/server/model/players/packets/*.java src/server/model/shops/*.java src/server/net/*.java src/server/task/*.java src/server/util/*.java src/server/world/*.java src/server/util/log/*.java src/server/*.java src/server/world/map/*.java[/code]

item.title: PI Compile error Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

Use wine to compile, makes it a fuckton more easier.

Wine doesn’t let me do anything with cmd really. I’ll try though.

item.title: PI Compile error Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:399130”]try this

#!/bin/sh javac -classpath:./deps/poi.jar:./deps/mysql.jar:./deps/mina.jar:./deps/slf4j.jar:./deps/slf4j-nop.jar:./deps/jython.jar:./deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar -d ./bin/ src/server/event/*.java:src/server/model/items/*.java:src/server/model/minigames/*.java:src/server/model/npcs/*.java:src/server/model/objects/*.java:src/server/model/players/*.java:src/server/model/players/skills/*.java:src/server/model/players/packets/*.java:src/server/model/shops/*.java:src/server/net/*.java:src/server/task/*.java:src/server/util/*.java:src/server/world/*.java:src/server/util/log/*.java:src/server/*.java:src/server/world/map/*.java[/quote]

brandon@brandon-ET1331G:~/Desktop/SageScape2$ bash Compiler.sh javac: invalid flag: -classpath:./deps/poi.jar:./deps/mysql.jar:./deps/mina.jar:./deps/slf4j.jar:./deps/slf4j-nop.jar:./deps/jython.jar:./deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options

item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:


brandon@brandon-ET1331G:~/Desktop/SageScape2$ bash Compiler.sh
javac: invalid flag: src/server/world/map/*.java
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options

SH file: #!/bin/sh deps="$deps deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:deps/jython.jar:deps/xstream.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/poi.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar" dirs="$dirs src/server/event/*.java src/server/model/items/*.java src/server/model/minigames/*.java src/server/model/npcs/*.java src/server/model/objects/*.java src/server/model/players/*.java src/server/model/players/skills/*.java src/server/model/players/packets/*.java src/server/model/shops/*.java src/server/net/*.java src/server/task/*.java src/server/util/*.java src/server/world/*.java src/server/util/log/*.java src/server/*.java src/server/world/map/*.java" javac -classpath $deps -d bin $dirs
Same error when like: #!/bin/sh javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:deps/jython.jar:deps/xstream.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/poi.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src/server/event/*.java src/server/model/items/*.java src/server/model/minigames/*.java src/server/model/npcs/*.java src/server/model/objects/*.java src/server/model/players/*.java src/server/model/players/skills/*.java src/server/model/players/packets/*.java src/server/model/shops/*.java src/server/net/*.java src/server/task/*.java src/server/util/*.java src/server/world/*.java src/server/util/log/*.java src/server/*.java src/server/world/map/*.java
